title: Zyra crash when using E
body: My game has crashed twice when I used E on zyra on an enemy champion. I don't know if this has already been discovered, and I'm not 100% sure how to re-do it. If it's any help, the second time it crashed I rooted an enemy Kai'sa. Not sure what is going on. I'll update with any details.

replies.body:
It sounds like it might be a bad patch or file interaction specific to your client. Zyra may not be the most popular champ atm but a global bug that big more than likely would have been found much sooner than this.

Try running a **client repair** through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair.

If you're still having dramas try **reinstalling the game** with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

If that still doesn't fix your issue **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further.
